title: Person of Interest Soundtrack - Revenge
author: AshesInTheWind1
comment: John Reese makes James Bond look like a Girl Scout.
Never forget this tremendous episode, how Reese got his revenge and how Harold met John for the first time, ohh guys it was the saddest episode ever along with the finale song
This episode was so heartbreaking. My heart shattered into pieces when Harold said "I am so sorry."

Pain, I guess it's a matter of sensation
But somehow you have ways of avoiding it all
In my mind I have shot you and stabbed you through your heart
I just didn't understand, the ricochet is the second part
"When you find that one person who connects you to the world, you become someone different. Someone better. When that person is taken from you, what do you become then?"
description: Danger Mouse & Sparklehorse - Revenge (ft. Wayne Coyne), Person of Interest 1x21
